title: How to Develop the Habit of Joy and Attract Abundance: Exercises Using NLP Anchors
first_phrase: In the previous part of the text, the author emphasizes the importance of developing the habit of joy through conscious effort and training. He also cautions us about the contagious nature of emotions and the need to choose our company carefully. In the last 200 tokens, the author introduces two exercises aimed at creating resourceful states through anchoring techniques. The exercises involve connecting money to positive emotions such as playfulness and joy. By anchoring these emotions to a physical cue, we can access them at will and attract the energy of money with the right mindset.
